column5: Are you looking for a new and different approach to management, accounting and finance? Our master's programme Management & Sustainable Accounting and Finance provides valuable insights into these areas. Interdisciplinary and transdisciplinary theories and methods support you in designing sustainable solutions for current challenges in the business world.  Learn more about the course contents.Interested in this programme? Join our digital information day on 16 November 2023 to learn more application requirements and the content of the programme. You can register here!International MobilityIf you like, you can integrate a period to study abroad at one of our partner institutions or as a free mover in the 3rd semester.
column7: You do not have to pay tuition fees, only a contribution of approx. 370 EUR per semester (subject to change). For this contribution you receive a semester ticket, which covers public transport in Lüneburg and the surrounding area (e.g., Hamburg, Bremen, Lübeck).
